p: While 1,886 participants (of 3,135, 60.2%) reported never having used synthetic drugs in their lifetimes, a total of 1,249 had used synthetic drugs at least once before, for an overall lifetime synthetic drug use prevalence of 39.8% ( Fig 1). Among those who reported having used synthetic drugs in their lifetimes, 96.3% (1,203/1,249) reported having used poppers and 3.7% (46/1,203) reported having used other synthetic drugs such as methamphetamine, ketamine, ecstasy, and Magu (data not shown).
